Header.instructions:
Use a literal small portion of the testimonial. Only use 2-3 keywords highlighting the company’s qualities or the great experience. 
 Example: From the review, \“Great company to work with. Booking appointment was easy and professional.\” the title would be \“Easy and Professional.\”  
 From the review, \“Melvin did a fantastic job. He was professional, respectful of the property, and left everything looking great.\” the title would be “Fantastic Job.\” 
 From the review, \“Everything from the first e-mail was top notch! I will certainly hire them again!!! Melvin was so kind and helpful!\” the title would be \“Top-Notch Services.\”

Reviews.instructions: Use available information to create 1 Review in the Reviews array. Use one recent Review, no more than 6 months old if possible. Use the provided icon for all authors. Do not use any Yelp reviews.

example.Body: The body for the Review goes here. It should be a short paragraph about what the person is saying about the company.

Author.Name: Name of the person.
Author.Source: Source of the review. For example, Google, Facebook, Nicejob, etc.
